description: ff. 109. 225 x 193; 200 x 140 mm. 25 lin. Rajab 714, Aḥmad ibn Sunqur; collated with a copy belonging to Qiwām al-Dīn al-Itqānī by Yaʻqūb ibn Muḥsin ibn Baylīk in 791 H. (note on fol. 109a). Identified as Tajrīd by Aḥmad S.Yahuda (note inside front cover) - Brockelmann, GAL, I, 184 (III)? Acephalous - on fol. 2a begins bāb al-khulʻ: ... الخلع طلاق عندنا وقال الشافعى هو فسخ فى احد القولىن ولهذا قال اصحابنا ان من قال The last chapter begins: ... کتاب الوقف والصدقة فى الباب فصلان فصل فى الوقت وفصل فى الصدقة اما الاول اجمع العلماء ان من وقف ارضه او داره
author: Qudūrī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 972 or 3-1037
title: al-Tajrīd.
creator: Qudūrī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 972 or 3-1037
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
